Name: hexamethylene-1,6-diisocyanate production | hexamethylene-1,6-diisoncyanate | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Hexamethylen-1,6-diisocyanate (HDI) is manufactured from hexamethylenediamine. The reaction of hexamethylenediamine and phosgene result in hexamethylene-1,6-diisocyanate. A yield of 95% was assumed.;C6H16N2+2COCl2 -> C8H12N2O2 + 2 HCl;Sodium hydroxide is added to neutralize the formed hydrochloric acid.;Reference(s):;Six C., Richter F., (2005). Isocyantes, Organic, Ullmanns Encyclopedia of Industrial Chemistry.
